name: Overgrown (Art Direction School Project)
description:
This project is part of a school project from the The Royal Danish Academy. The project is based on Alex McDowell's Junk World initiative, with the focus of the project being world build and art direction.

The project was a group project that went on through 4 weeks separated into two different 2 week segments. 

The Group and their roles:
Mads Kramer: 3D modelling, Programming and Implementation, Tech Artist
Fabrizio Vacca: 3D modelling, Implementation, Art Director
Mads Arvedsen: Sound Design, Level Design, Concept Artist
Marcus Rasmussen: 3D Modelling and Texturing
